document.full_text: italy's market watchdog consob is to speed up its examination of the offer prospectus filed by french dairy group lactalis for italian rival parmalat , consob's head said in an newspaper interview on sunday.
document.title: italian watchdog to decide fast on parmalat: paper
lines_and_colors: italy's market watchdog consob is to speed up its examination of the offer prospectus filed by french dairy group lactalis for italian rival parmalat , consob's head said in an newspaper interview on sunday.
